deity.name: Melora
deity.text: Melora is the god of the wilderness and the sea. She is both the wild beast and the peaceful forest, the raging whirlpool and the quiet desert. Rangers, hunters, and elves revere her, and sailors make offerings to her before beginning their voyages. Her strictures are these:
► Protect the wild places of the world from destruction and overuse. Oppose rampant spread of cities and empires.
► Hunt aberrant monsters and other abominations of nature.
► Do not fear or condemn the savagery of nature. Live in harmony with the wild.

power.title: Melora's Tide
power.fluff: Melora sends a tide of healing energy to aid you or a bloodied friend

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally; the target must be bloodied

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains regeneration 2 until the end of the encounter or until he or she is no longer bloodied, whichever comes first.

power.title: Nowhere to Hide
power.fluff: As the sound of your prayer spreads around you, your foes are revealed

section.name: Channel Divinity:
section.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each hidden or invisible enemy in the burst whose Will is equal to or lower than 12 + your level

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each target is visible to you and grants combat advantage to you.
